Program 1 : Load 2 numbers from memory, add them and store them back in memory.


lwz R1, R0, 1;
lwz R2, R0, 2;
add R3, R1, R2;
sw  R3, R0, 3;

=========

10000000001000000000000000000001
10000000010000000000000000000010
01111100011000100000101000010100
10010000011000000000000000000011


-------------------------------------------------------
Program 2 : Load a number from memory, and find the sum of all numbers between the number(inclusive) and number + 10.


lwz R1, 1(R0)
addi R3, R1, 10
loop:
add R2, R2, R1
addi R1, R1, 1
bne R3, R1, loop
sw R2, 2(R0)

==========


10000000001000000000000000000001
00111000011000010000000000001010
01111100010000100000101000010100
00111000001000010000000000000001
01001100011000011111111111110100
10010000010000000000000000000010
